attributes.action: Close schools from 4th Jan 2021 due to increase infection rate
attributes.additional_details: Due to the increased corona virus infection rate in recent days and fact that we have all sacrificed so much to country it is more logical to keep schools / colleagues / universities closed in England until infection rate is under control
attributes.background: Close all schools/colleagues and universities from 4th January 2021 until the corona infection rate is controlled

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
